snippet: Expecting to return from New York with celebratory trinkets and clothing representing a historic weekend, but instead returning with an empty suitcase and a very strong belief that it most definitely could have been.
abstract: Expecting to return from New York with celebratory trinkets and clothing representing a historic weekend, but instead returning with an empty suitcase and a very strong belief that it most definitely could have been.

headline.main: A Suitcase Packed With Expectations, Stowed Away Until Next Year
